ResearchProjectDef.label: Manufacturing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build manufacturing benches and efficient work center.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->pioneered the integration of complex machinery for mass production, heralding a new era of efficiency
subject_story->transformed raw materials into marvels of utility, fueling the expansion of civilization
subject_story->devised systems of assembly that became the heartbeat of the community's economic engine
subject_story->cultivated a culture of innovation, where every tool and machine is a step towards the future
subject_story->founded the principles of modern manufacturing, blending craftsmanship with the precision of technology
subject_gerund->carving the path towards a self-sustaining society with the power of industrial manufacturing
